short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download files from simple download links with a single middle click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool automates the process of opening multiple tabs, saving time and effort for users who frequently visit the same websites. Perfect for streamlining repetitive browsing tasks, it helps you manage your workflow efficiently with just a few clicks.
If you like it and want to help me get the extension better looking and more cool stuff then feel free to go into https://github.com/wirytiox/Download-Companion

1.5.3 new functionality to communicate with qbitorrent.

1.4.1 fix logic in how downloads work. previously enabling auto-download triggered a save as prompt. not fast at all. now if you disable in Download setting Ask me before download where to save option it will download the file really fast :D
